idea-plugin.name: NotesTree
idea-plugin.description:
If you tired of hundred tabs in Notepad++, this plugin brings consistency and availability to your notes in pretty convenient way. The plugin adds ability to write tree structure global notes in such formats as txt, md, json, xml, yaml, sql, csv, xlsx, sh or http. The plugin brings you the way to keep Dockerfile or docker_compose templates, images(png, jpg), pdf, doc, docx, java, python or kotlin files and create symbolic links(MacOS, Linux). It also supports plum and mermaid diagrams.

Intellij idea also provides you to possibility to directly from the plugin run some of these notes like http files, sql scripts or docker_compose templates, it is really convenient and useful during development.

The plugin page github

plum files require plum integration plugin.

http files require HTTP client plugin.

Dockerfile, docker_compose.yaml require Docker plugin.

png, jpg images, pdf, csv, doc ,docx, xlsx files can be inserted from clipboard.

conf files require Nginx Configuration plugin

Supported formats

  • txt
  • md
  • json
  • xml
  • yaml
  • sql
  • sh
  • csv
  • http
  • pdf
  • jpg
  • png
  • plump
  • kt
  • java
  • py
  • svg
  • conf
  • doc, docx
  • xlsx
  • log
